articles.title: Joe Biden speaks with UK's Boris Johnson after Kabul's fall, agrees on virtual G7 summit over Afghanistan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The sudden Taliban victory has sparked fears of a large-scale humanitarian crisis both in Afghanistan and possibly involving waves of refugees seeking asylum abroad, including in western Europe. | World News
articles.content:
US President Joe Biden and British Prime Minister Boris Johnson discussed Afghanistan on Tuesday and announced a virtual summit of the G7 leaders on the crisis, the White House said.

articles.title: Vega Rocket Blasts Off With Airbus Observation Satellite, Miniature CubeSats - Gadgets 360
articles.description: A European Vega rocket lifted off from French Guiana carrying an Earth observation satellite and four miniature CubeSats.
articles.content:
A European Vega rocket lifted off Monday night from French Guiana carrying an Earth observation satellite and four miniature "cubesats".

articles.title: LOOK: Sicily's Mount Etna taller than ever after six months of activity - Independent Online
articles.description: Mount Etna's southeastern crater has grown in height after six months of activity, Italy's vulcano monitoring agency, making Europe's tallest active vulcano taller than ever.
articles.content:
Rome - Mount Etna's southeastern crater has grown in height after six months of activity, Italy's vulcano monitoring agency said Tuesday, making Europe's tallest active volcano taller than ever.
